object.description: Unscrupulous and charming, you separate fools from their money; thankfully, there is no shortage of fools…

level1.items: Backpack, 2 Sets of Clothing, Deck of Cards, Dice
level1.name: Swindler

level2.items: 1 Forged Document, 2 Sets of Quality Clothing, Selection of Coloured Powders and Water, Selection of Trinkets and Charms
level2.name: Charlatan

level3.items: Disguise Kit, Lock Picks, Multiple Forged Documents
level3.name: Con Artist

object.name: Charlatan

object.description: Unscrupulous and charming, you separate fools from their money; thankfully, there is no shortage of fools…

level1.items: Backpack, 2 Sets of Clothing, Deck of Cards, Dice
level1.name: Swindler

level2.items: 1 Forged Document, 2 Sets of Quality Clothing, Selection of Coloured Powders and Water, Selection of Trinkets and Charms
level2.name: Charlatan

level3.items: Disguise Kit, Lock Picks, Multiple Forged Documents
level3.name: Con Artist

object.name: Charlatan

object.description: A small bottle of perfumes.
object.name: Perfume

object.description: Nobles' ceremonial outfit.
object.name: Courtly Garb

object.description: Concoction. Forms: potion. Drinker becomes immune to all poisons for 1 hour.
object.name: Stag's Ward

object.description: Vial of Schlaff poison. Anyone affected by it shows the following symptoms: slurred speech, apathy, sleepiness, and heave red-rimmed eyes. A Character with medical knowledge may attempt a Hard (-20) Lore - Medicine Test to identify the cause of these symptoms. If a character consumes it, they need to pass a Hard (-20) Endurance Test or gain one Fatigued Condition for each dose consumed.
object.name: Vial of Schlaf

object.description: Female Woodelf. Age: 35, Height: 6'5", Eyes: Copper and Amber, Hair: Yellow Blond
Deadlier version of a knife. Broken sword can act as dagger with Dangerous Flaw if it lacks integral hilt.
object.name: Dagger

object.description: Regular cloths.
object.name: Clothing

object.description: Sling bag you can wear over your shoulder. Counts as "worn" when slung over shoulder.
object.name: Sling Bag

object.description: Cloak without hood. Protects against the elements. When wrapped around hand can be used as parrying weapon. When making a Test to see if an opponent becomes entangled in a cloak, the cloak has a Strength of 25.
object.name: Cloak

object.description: Gains a bonus of +1 SL to any Melee Test when opposing an incoming attack.
object.name: Defensive

object.description: Any successfully hit target gains the Entangled Condition with a Strength value equal to Strength Characteristic of the attacker. When Entangling a target, the attacker cannot otherwise use the weapon to hit. The attacker can end the Entangling at any time.
object.name: Entangle

object.description: All APs are doubled against Undamaging weapons. The weapon does not automatically inflict a minimum of 1 Wound on a successful hit in combat.
object.name: Undamaging

object.description: A hood.
object.name: Hood

object.description: A gold ring with engraved stamp. Usually worn by nobles or high ranking guild officials.
object.name: Signet Ring

object.description: A gold etched headress with dangling silver chains, on a twisted wooden base. A very fashionable hat in the tree top aristocracy.
object.name: Headress
1S1 Ambassador - Linsor Foamheart
object.notes: You are actually a high elf, and you are not an Ambassador.

object.description: Proficiency at riding animals.
object.name: Ride

object.description: Ability to handle alcohol without  suffering its negative consequences.
object.name: Consume Alcohol

object.description: Allows to quickly find useful gossips and spread rumors efficiently.
object.name: Gossip

object.description:
You can swim. Swimming in calm water does not need a Test to succeed.
The test is required if there are any adverse conditions such as: currents, cold water, extra encumbrance, etc.
In combat, Swim is used when fighting in the water (deep). It replaces skills like Athletics to govern Movement. Your swim speed is half of your Movement speed.
object.name: Swim

object.description:
By having a level in this Skill, you are automatically assumed to be able to row in calm water.
The Row Skill Test is usually necessary when rowing in some adverse conditions or racing.
object.name: Row

object.description: Makes people think better of you and your actions.
object.name: Charm

object.description: Let you estimate the value of rare artifacts, works of art, and other unusual goods.
object.name: Evaluate

object.description: You can use it to entertain people near you with your talents such as stories, songs, acting, etc. The SL of the Entertain Test shows how much others like your performance.
object.name: Entertain

object.description: Describes how well you move and perform physical activities such as jumping or running.
object.name: Athletics

object.description: Allows to resist influence of others (such as Charm or Intimidate).
object.name: Cool

object.description: Lets you create works of art. To use Art without extra penalties you have to have access to appropriate Trade Tools. Large projects might require extended Tests. SL determines the quality of your work.
object.name: Art

object.description: Ability to guide basic vehicles such as carts and lumbering coaches.
object.name: Drive

object.description:
Let's you perform nimble hand movements that allow to pick pockets, perform car/coin tricks, etc. Test of this Skill is usually Opposed by the Perception of your target.
You can also use this Skill in gambling.  Before any round you may attempt Sleight of Hand Test (Opposed if other are suspecting you). If you succeed to may reverse your Gamble Test tat round if necessary.
object.name: Sleight of Hand

object.description:
Your ability to operate a Frigate or a similar ship. You are automatically presumed to be able to sail in calm water. 
Test is usually necessary when sailing in adverse conditions or racing.
You can use Sail as a basic Skill with any other Specialisations.
object.name: Sail - Frigate

object.description: How well can you lead others and command their respect.
object.name: Leadership

object.description:
Allows you to befriend or subjugate animals.
Take an Opposed Charm Animal/Willpower test. If the animal(s) is docile, this Test is not Opposed. You can influence WP Bonus + SL animals at once.
In combat, if you succeed, any affected animals will not attack you this round and you gain +1 Advantage. You can use this skill every Round until you fail the Test. After failing, you cannot use it on the same animals anymore.
object.name: Charm Animal

object.description: Help with orientation in wilderness using any means available: maps, landmarks, stars, etc.
object.name: Navigation

object.description: Determines how good you are at climbing.
object.name: Climb

object.description: Dodge allows you to avoid harm by ducking, diving, sidestepping, etc.
object.name: Dodge

object.description: You can fight and coerce others to influence their behavior.
object.name: Intimidate

object.description: Lets you get a sense when something is wrong or when people might be hiding something from you.
object.name: Intuition

object.description: Training and experience with the weapons from Basic group.
object.name: Melee - Basic

object.description: You can use it to entertain people near you with your singing. The SL of the Entertain Test shows how much others like your songs.
object.name: Entertain - Singing

object.description: You can use it to entertain people near you with your acting. The SL of the Entertain Test shows how much others like your performance.
object.name: Entertain - Acting

object.description: Allows to estimate probability of winning and improve chances of winning.
object.name: Gamble

object.description: Ability to notice with any sense available.
object.name: Perception

object.description: Indicates how good you are in surviving in the wilderness.
object.name: Outdoor Survival

object.description: Allows you to guess how likely someone is to accept a bribe, and how to best offer it.
object.name: Bribery

object.description: Training and experience with weapons from the Bow group.
object.name: Ranged - Bow

object.description: You can use it to entertain people near you with your stories. The SL of the Entertain Test shows how much others like your stories.
object.name: Entertain - Storytelling

object.description: Describes how well you endure physical hardships. Endurance is Tested to resist or recover from various Conditions and helps to recover lost Wounds.
object.name: Endurance

object.description: Allows to negotiate a better deal.
object.name: Haggle

object.description: Training and experience with a particular type of melee weapon.
object.name: Melee

object.description:
Lets you hide and move undetected in a particular type on environment.  Stealth Test is Opposed by opponent's Perception Skill. The Test is modified by a number of  situational factors such as: lighting condition, your camouflage, etc.
In combat, Stealth can be used to prepare for an Ambush.
object.name: Stealth

object.description: You can use it to entertain people near you with your talents such as stories, songs, acting, etc. The SL of the Entertain Test shows how much others like your performance.
object.name: Entertain - Singing or Storytelling

object.description: Lets you create works of art. To use Art without extra penalties you have to have access to appropriate Trade Tools. Large projects might require extended Tests. SL determines the quality of your work.
object.name: Art - Sculpture or Engraving

object.description: Allows to take Perception Test to detect barely detectable visual details, for example things that are far away, very small, or do not stand out from the background.
object.name: Acute Sense - Sight

object.description: Permanent +5 bonus to Intelligence Characteristic (Int) that does not count towards Advances.
object.name: Savvy

object.description:
You can see clearly in the low light conditions (there has to be some faint source of light) for 20 yards per level of Night Vision. 
Night Vision extends the effectiveness of any light sources by 20 yards per level.
object.name: Night Vision

object.description: If you are approaching a dangerous situation, GM may take a secret Intuition Test for you. If successful, your GM will warn you and you don't get Surprised condition when attacked.
object.name: Sixth Sense
object.tests: Intuition Tests involving your Sixth Sense

object.description: You can read and write (if appropriate) all of the Languages you can speak.
object.name: Read/Write

object.description:
If you achieve Success in Gamble or Sleight of Hand Test playing card games, you may chose to use your unit die roll to determine Test's SL.
If you play real card games to represent in-game games, you get extra number of cards (per deal) equal your Cardship level, then you discard any cards so that your hand-size remains the same.
object.name: Cardsharp
object.tests: Gamble and Sleight of Hand when playing card games

object.description:
If you achieve Success in Gamble or Sleight of Hand Test playing dice games, you may chose to use your unit die roll to determine Test's SL.
If you are using real-life dice games to represent in-game games, always roll extra number of rolls equal to the level of Diceman, and chose the best results.
object.name: Diceman
object.tests: Gamble and Sleight of Hand when playing dice games

object.description:
When Earning or during Income Endeavour add the following per Talent level:
Career Level 1, +2d10 bp
Career Level 2, +1d10 ss
Career Level 3, +2d10 ss
Career Level 4, +1 gc
You have visible signs you are a criminal, and others without Criminal Talent consider you lower Status.
Authorities are always suspicious of you (increasingly with the level of this Talent).
GM can agree to remove levels of this Talent for the same XP it cost to buy.
object.name: Criminal

object.description:
Rapidly talking nonsense without letting other interrupt you. 
Lets you attempt Opposed Charm/Intelligence Test. Success gives 1 Stunned Condition for each level of Blather.
If you stop talking, the affected person loses all Stunned Conditions right away. You attempt this one per person.
object.name: Blather
